summary:
**Summary of ASX Listing Information Form (Stapled Entities):**  

- **Structure Documentation**: Stapling agreement between **BWP Property Group Ltd** (ACN 688 059 074) and **BWP Trust** (ARSN 088 581 097) is detailed in the Meeting Booklet (section 10.4, page 68).  
- **Key Waivers Sought**:  
  - ASX Listing Rule waivers requested (spread and 20-cent issue price compliance) via application lodged on **17 June 2025** (Meeting Booklet, section 10.6, page 69).  
  - ASIC relief application also lodged on **17 June 2025** (section 10.5, pages 68–69).  
- **Unstapling Mechanism**: Board holds power to unstaple securities per Clause 30 of the BWP Trust Constitution (Meeting Booklet, page 100).  

**No material trading or capital markets impact identified** (document pertains to listing compliance only).
